dcterms:creator: M. Volpi
G. Camps-Valls
D. Tuia
dcterms:description: A dataset containing multispectral images acquired by Landsat 5 TM before a forest fire in Bastrop County, Texas, and an Earth Observing-1 Advanced Land Imager (EO-1 ALI) multispectral acquisition after the event.
dcterms:title: Texas Forest Fire Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Zhang
M. Gong
L. Su
J. Liu
Z. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising a multispectral image from Landsat 8 and a SAR image from Sentinel-1A, used for detecting changes after a flood in California.
dcterms:title: California Flood Dataset
